name: Nonorelia
description:
In 2754, Nonorel V served as a hub for interstellar shipping and manufacturing, run by engineer Noah Von Sterne and his family. This all changes in an instant, however, when a massive explosion decimates the colony. Does Noah have what it takes to save his home and his family?

Throughout the story of Nonorelia, you must solve nonograms to overcome obstacles and progress further. Think before you act! Noah's choices may have consequences down the line.

Features


Unlike most nonogram games, Nonorelia's puzzles can have non-rectangular shapes! In cases where the numbers would overlap, they dynamically adjust to avoid collisions based on your mouse cursor.



Nonorelia also features a moving camera! This allows for truly enormous puzzles too large to fit on the screen.



In total, Nonorelia offers:

  • A rich, immersive logic puzzle experience with sophisticated audio and visual cues — solving nonograms has never been this fun!
  • A fully voiced visual novel storyline, starring established voice talents
  • Over 240 (and counting!) uniquely shaped puzzles to solve in Picture Mode
  • Over 30 (and counting!) stories to unveil in Picture Mode, with fully voiced narrations and beautiful full-resolution artwork
  • Infinite randomly generated puzzles of all shapes and sizes (up to 99x99 tiles)
  • A soothing, tantalizing auditory experience to fall asleep to in ASMR Mode
  • Selectable difficulty levels to suit any player, from beginners to nonogram veterans
  • Fully voiced interactive tutorials with tips and strategies for all skill levels
  • An advanced hint system that explains each answer, helping you improve
  • A tile flagging system that allows you to mark tiles for later, opening up more puzzle-solving tactics
  • Multiple tilesets to customize the look and feel, both visually and aurally
  • Over 60 minutes (and counting!) of lovingly crafted original soundtrack
  • Over 40 achievements

All depicted characters are 18 years of age or older.
